skins.shipDescription: Essex-class aircraft carrier C Shangri-La, Hull Number CV-38.
skins.selfIntroduction: My name, Shangri-La, has its origins in a famous operation from the war. Being an Essex-class, I've been all over the world and got to record a myriad of things and events in my notebook. This, to me, is my source of pride.
skins.acquisition: CV-38, Shangri-La, has arrived. I'd like to share the stories in this notebook with you someday... but first, let's concentrate on the task at hand.
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. I recorded all the noteworthy events that took place while you were gone. Would you care to read about them?
skins.details: I strictly follow the principle of divulging nothing to outsiders, but giving full disclosure to my superior officers.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Are you curious about these butterflies? Bugwatching is one of my hobbies, actually. I brought these darlings with me from Panama.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Anti-sub warfare? I'd love to try my hand at it, should the opportunity arise. Who knows, I may be surprisingly talented!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ensuring you stay in good health is part of my job, Commander. I sincerely urge you to be careful so as to not overwork yourself.
skins.secretaryTouch: Which story would you like to hear, Commander? The one about the undiscovered haven, or the wonderland beyond the horizon?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Did you just perform a health examination on me?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: My hair ornaments? They're a gift from Yat Sen; she said they go well with my name.

skins.shipDescription: Commander, welcome to my "Utopia." Here, you can find my prized collection. Now, where should we start our detailed tour?
skins.acquisition: Commander, welcome to my "Utopia." Here, you can find my prized collection. Now, where should we start our detailed tour?
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Let's warm you up with a nice, hot drink. Would you like coffee or hot cocoa?
skins.details: This shawl you gave me is really cozy. Hehe, let's huddle up like this... There, now we share the warmth.
skins.secretaryIdle1: If the opportunity presents itself, I might just host my own exhibit. Perhaps I could call it... "Caracal"?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wouldn't mind sharing some of my prized specimens with you, Commander. You'd take good care of them, wouldn't you?
skins.secretaryIdle3: *click*! Nice, a fine new addition to my photo collection. I name it... "Fleet Commander, in Profile." Hehehe~
skins.secretaryTouch: Would you like to learn how to pin a specimen, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Both specimens and girls alike must be treated delicately. Understood, Commander?

skins.shipDescription: This specimen looks to be fairly ancient... You could watch from behind me, or you could join me for an up-close examination; we can enjoy our time here however you wish.
